Package org.drip.analytics.cashflow

Class ReferenceIndexPeriod

java.lang.Object
org.drip.analytics.cashflow.ReferenceIndexPeriod
public class ReferenceIndexPeriod
extends java.lang.Object
ReferenceIndexPeriod contains the Cash Flow Period Details. Currently it holds the Start Date, the End Date, the Fixing Date, and the Reference Latent State Label.

  • Module = Product Core Module
  • Library = Fixed Income Analytics
  • Project = Date, Cash Flow, and Cash Flow Period Measure Generation Utilities
  • Package = Unit and Composite Cash Flow Periods
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
